#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              int a,b,c;
              scanf("%d %d %d",&a,&b,&c);
              int x=(c%(a+b));
              if(x!=0 && x<=a)
              printf("Aman\n");
              else
              printf("Anish\n");              
              }
              return 0;
              }
